modName: Shadow Cloak - Champion of Boethiah ring
summary: Ring with constant noise attenuation effect and only for estetic effect Shadow cloak around player when is sneaking.
descriptionHtml:
----====Champion of Boethiah ring===-----
-----=== Campione di Boethiah ===-------


The Champion of Boethiah (Campione di Boethiah ingame) is a ring, that when equip, let player be surrounded by shadows when sneaking (is only a visual effect, no other action from shadow) and activate a limited attenuation effect :D i created ring only for the visual effect and i love it, the death from the shadow have no price XD


Item can be crafted under Jewelry with :
 1 gold ingot
 1 Ebony ingot
 1 deathbell
 1 golden diamond  
and no perk are needed.

INSTALLATION

without Nexus Mod Manager
== copy \"CampioneDiBoethiah.esp\" in Data Folder and enable in data file

With Nexus Mod Manager
== add mod in list and activate \"CampioneDiBoethiah.esp\" as usual in load order :D
 
PS: ingame item name is \"Campione di Boethiah\"

Harlequin83
author: Harlequin83
